General.Name: Nanjing Aolian Ae&Ea Co Ltd
General.Description: NanJing AoLian AE&EA Co.,Ltd provides automotive power control components in China. The company is also involved in the research, development, production, and sale of body control system components. It offers electronic accelerator pedal assemblies, shift controllers, vehicle air conditioning controllers, low temperature starting device, electronic throttle valve, rearview mirror, solenoid, new energy vehicle controller, new energy high voltage power distribution boxes, and other automotive components. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China.

2.Name: Mr. Xintian  Lu
2.Title: Head of the Technical Department & Deputy GM
